text: Jordan Johnson (born 9 October 1986) is an international footballer who plays as a forward for Leek Town F.C. and the British Virgin Islands national football team. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list British Virgin Islands' goal tally first. {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- !Goal!!Date!!Venue!!Opponent!!Score!!Result!!Competition |- || 1. || 26 March 2015 || Windsor Park, Roseau, Dominica || || align=center | 2–1 || align=center | 2–3 || 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification |- || 2. || 25 July 2018 || Raoul Illidge Sports Complex, Philipsburg, Sint Maarten || || align=center | 2–2 || align=center | 3–2 || Friendly |} ==References== ==External links== * *Caribbean Football Database profile Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Leek Town F.C. players Category:British Virgin Islands footballers Category:British Virgin Islands international footballers Category:Congleton Town F.C. players Category:Newcastle Town F.C. players Category:A.F.C. title: Jordan Johnson (footballer)
